overview: As time passes by with dementia patients, faded memories turn into fragments that their minds could not remember every detail. The power of photos holds in capturing moments, it can be a witness, and also immortalize time. Photographs fade too, over time details from the photo can be erased . But without oneâ€™s mindfulness as it degenerates, photos are just another tangible thing we have left. How can a machine process without its processor?
title: unti-unti
